Package com.tome25.utils.lib

Class LibraryLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tome25.utils.lib.LibraryLoader
  • public class LibraryLoader
extends Object
    This class can add Jar Files to the classpath at runtime. You will need to copy this class and JarExtractor and/or LibraryDownloader into your project in order to add this library to the classpath at runtime(requires a restart as of version 1.0.126). This class can be used as a java agent, to add stuff to the classpath without a restart, this behavior is deprecated tho.
    Author:
    ToMe25

      static void init​(String[] args)
      Initializes a LibraryLoader, restarts your JVM if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilities, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar and adds it to the classpath.
      static void init​(String[] args, File logFile)
      Initializes a LibraryLoader, restarts your JVM if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilities, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar, adds it to the classpath, and sets the system outputs to LoggingPrintStream printing to a logger writing to the log files and the previous OutputStreams.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LibraryLoader

        @Deprecated
public LibraryLoader​(String[] mainArgs)
              throws IOException
        Deprecated.
        use the non java agent library loading instead.
        Creates a new LibraryLoader, it is recommended to do this at the start of your program, as this may need to restart to JVM, which is what it needs the arguments from your main method for. Part of the Java Agent.
        Parameters:
        mainArgs - the main methods arguments.
        Throws:
        IOException - if this program isn't a jar or doesn't exists. And if somehow creating a JarFile instance fails.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init​(String[] args)
        Initializes a LibraryLoader, restarts your JVM if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilities, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar and adds it to the classpath.
        Parameters:
        args - the program arguments.

      • init

        public static void init​(String[] args,
                        File logFile)
        Initializes a LibraryLoader, restarts your JVM if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilities, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar, adds it to the classpath, and sets the system outputs to LoggingPrintStream printing to a logger writing to the log files and the previous OutputStreams.
        Parameters:
        args - the program arguments.
        logFile - the log file for System.out and System.err. set to null to disable changing System.out and System.err.

      • init

        public static void init​(String[] args,
                        File logFile,
                        String defaultUrlStorage)
        Initializes a LibraryLoader, restarts your JVM if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilities, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar, adds it to the classpath, and sets the system outputs to LoggingPrintStream printing to a logger writing to the log files and the previous OutputStreams.
        Parameters:
        args - the program arguments.
        logFile - the log file for System.out and System.err. set to null to disable changing System.out and System.err.
        defaultUrlStorage - the default contents for the URL storage file that lists the URLs to try and download ToMe25s-Java-Utilities from.

      • init

        public static void init​(String[] args,
                        File outputLogFile,
                        File errorLogFile)
        Initializes a LibraryLoader, restarts your JVM if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilities, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar, adds it to the classpath, and sets the system outputs to LoggingPrintStream printing to a logger writing to the log files and the previous OutputStreams.
        Parameters:
        args - the program arguments.
        outputLogFile - the log file for System.out. set to null to disable changing System.out.
        errorLogFile - the log file for System.err. set to null to disable changing System.err.

      • init

        public static void init​(String[] args,
                        File outputLogFile,
                        File errorLogFile,
                        String defaultUrlStorage)
        Initializes a LibraryLoader, restarts your JVM if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilities, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar, adds it to the classpath, and sets the system outputs to LoggingPrintStream printing to a logger writing to the log files and the previous OutputStreams.
        Parameters:
        args - the program arguments.
        outputLogFile - the log file for System.out. set to null to disable changing System.out.
        errorLogFile - the log file for System.err. set to null to disable changing System.err.
        defaultUrlStorage - the default contents for the URL storage file that lists the URLs to try and download ToMe25s-Java-Utilities from.

      • init

        public static void init​(String[] args,
                        File outputLogFile,
                        File errorLogFile,
                        String defaultUrlStorage,
                        boolean update)
        Initializes a LibraryLoader, restarts your JVM if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilities, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar, adds it to the classpath, and sets the system outputs to LoggingPrintStream printing to a logger writing to the log files and the previous OutputStreams.
        Parameters:
        args - the program arguments.
        outputLogFile - the log file for System.out. set to null to disable changing System.out.
        errorLogFile - the log file for System.err. set to null to disable changing System.err.
        defaultUrlStorage - the default contents for the URL storage file that lists the URLs to try and download ToMe25s-Java-Utilities from.
        update - whether to download/extract the file if it already exists.

      • addThisToClasspath

        public static void addThisToClasspath()
        Adds ToMe25s-Java-Utilities to the classpath of it is in the libs directory next to this jar. Automatically restarts this software if necessary.

      • addLibToClasspath

        public static void addLibToClasspath​(String library)
        Adds the library with the given name inside the libs directory to the classpath.
        Parameters:
        library - the library to add.

      • addLibsToClasspath

        public static void addLibsToClasspath()
        Adds everything inside the libs folder to the classpath. Sadly just adding a "*" file in the directory doesn't work in the MANIFEST.MF attribute, so this looks for all .jar files that don't have "sources" or "javadoc" in their name in the libs directory. Automatically restarts this software if necessary.

      • addLibsToClasspath

        public static void addLibsToClasspath​(Predicate<String> libraryChecker)
        Adds everything inside the libs folder to the classpath. Sadly just adding a "*" file in the directory doesn't work in the MANIFEST.MF attribute, so this looks for all files matching the libraryChecker predicate. Automatically restarts this software if necessary.
        Parameters:
        libraryChecker - the predicate that checks what files to add to the classpath.
